videos.headline: Alabama gets on the board off a punt block
videos.description: Alabama's Chris Braswell gets in untouched to block the punt, and Jase McClellan scores to put the Crimson Tide ahead.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Alabama gets on the board off a punt block) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Kool-Aid McKinstry makes slick diving pick for Alabama
videos.description: Mercer QB Carter Peevy's pass is deflected and then intercepted by Alabama's Kool-Aid McKinstry.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kool-Aid McKinstry makes slick diving pick for Alabama) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Slade Bolden soars over a defender for an Alabama score
videos.description: Bryce Young dumps one off to Slade Bolden, who takes flight for another Alabama touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Brian Robinson Jr. lowers his shoulder for an Alabama TD) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Slade Bolden soars over a defender for an Alabama score
videos.description: Bryce Young dumps one off to Slade Bolden, who takes flight for another Alabama touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Slade Bolden soars over a defender for an Alabama score) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Jase McClellan walks in for Bama's 4th TD
videos.description: Alabama RB Jase McClellan extends Alabama's lead  with a five-yard touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF One Play (Jase McClellan walks in for Bama's 4th TD) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Bryce Young finds Jameson Williams for his 2nd TD pass
videos.description: Bryce Young connects with Jameson Williams for his second touchdown pass of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NCF One-Play (Bryce Young finds Jameson Williams for his 2nd TD pass) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Fred Payton puts Mercer on the board with 60-yard TD pass
videos.description: Fred Payton throws a 60-yard touchdown pass to Devron Harper for Mercer's first score of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NCF One Play (Fred Payton puts Mercer on the board with 60-yard TD pass) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Jase McClellan catches 21-yard TD pass for Alabama
videos.description: Jase McClellan pours it on for Alabama with a 21-yard touchdown in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NCF One Play (Jase McClellan catches 21-yard TD pass for Alabama) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Fred Payton connects with Ty James for a Mercer TD
videos.description: Fred Payton's second touchdown pass of the game goes for 22 yards to Ty James.

tracking.trackingName: NCF One Play (Fred Payton connects with Ty James for a Mercer TD) 2021/09/11

videos.headline: Alabama dominates Mercer in comprehensive win
videos.description: Bryce Young throws for 227 yards and three touchdown passes in a 48-14 win for Alabama vs. Mercer.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Alabama dominates Mercer in comprehensive win) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saban says top-ranked Tide still has work to do
videos.description: No. 1 Alabama's Nick Saban says after 48-14 rout of Mercer: "I just think we were a little bit sloppy today."
